articles.title: Fire engulfs a hospital ward in northern India, killing 10 newborn babies - NPR
articles.description: A fire tore through a neonatal intensive care unit in a hospital in northern India, killing 10 newborn babies and injuring 16 others, authorities said.
articles.content:
LUCKNOW, India A fire tore through a neonatal intensive care unit in a hospital in northern India, killing 10 newborn babies and injuring 16 others, authorities said.
The fire occurred late Friday a… [+2682 chars]
